qas.question: A toy lights up sometimes, but you are not sure which buttons cause it. What is a good way to find out?
choices: test one button at a time
press all and one at a time

qas.question: A box makes sounds, but you are not sure which button works. What is a good way to find out?
choices: test one button at a time
press all and one at a time

qas.question: A toy sometimes lights up and you want to know which switch does it. What should you do?
choices: try one switch at a time

qas.question: A music toy has three keys and you want to know which key makes the sound. What should you do?
choices: press one key at a time

qas.question: A bubble toy has three buttons and you want to know which makes bubbles. What should you do?
choices: press one button at a time

qas.question: A light box has four sliders and you want to know which slider turns it on. What should you do?
choices: move one slider at a time

qas.question: A wind toy has two levers and you want to know which starts the wind. What should you do?
choices: pull one lever at a time

qas.question: A pop-up toy has three knobs and you want to know which makes it pop. What should you do?
choices: turn one knob at a time

qas.question: A toy has four doors and you want to know which door hides the sound button. What should you do?
choices: open one door at a time

qas.question: A rattle has two parts and you want to know which part makes noise. What should you do?
choices: shake one part at a time

qas.question: A toy has three pedals and you want to know which pedal starts the light. What should you do?
choices: step on one pedal at a time
